modName: Requiem -- Vendors sell Bestial Stew and Elsweyr Fondue
summary: A simple change to give all food vendors in Requiem the opportunity to sell you expensive stews (rather than cook them yourself).
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#1e84cc][size=4]What does this mod do?
[/size][/color][/b]
It adds Bestial Stew and Elsweyr Fondue to the food vendors in Requiem

[b][color=#1e84cc][size=4]But why? You can just gather the ingredients and make it for free.Â [/size][/color][/b]

Yes, you can.

You can also craft items at the forge and buy potions at the alchemist and do lots of other stuff. But you're a busy man/woman. You're the dragonborn. You don't have time to slave in a kitchen or campfire spit.

[color=#3c78d8][size=4]Isn't this cheating? Doesn't it make the game easier?

[/size][/color]Yeah I guess. Look, I've got about 1,500 hours in Requiem and I still don't even know the ingredients that make Elsweyr Fondue. I've literally never made a single stew for that. And for Bestial Stew it's annoying running around gathering raw meat and wolf hearts and milk and salmon. I mean, I really do have better things to do. Seriously.

And anyway, I've only added ONE of each of these stews to the vendors. Which means you're not breaking your game in any way, shape, or form.

They're also really expensive. Check it out:

No perks in Speechcraft:

Bestial Stew: 277 septims
Elsweyr Fondue: 237 septims

1 perk in Haggling:

Bestial Stew: 266 septims
Elsweyr Fondue: 228 septims

[color=#1e84cc][size=4]Where can these amazing products be purchased?

[/size][/color]I'm glad you asked me this question. Anywhere that food is sold, basically.

1. Riverwood, Sleeping Giant Inn
2. Markarth, Silver Blood Inn
3. Whiterun, Bannered Mare
4. Dawnstar, Windpeak Inn
5. Morthal, Moorside Inn
6. Winterhold, Frozen Hearth
7. Old Hroldan Inn
8. Nightgate Inn
9. Rorikstead, Frost Fruit Inn
10. Riften, Bee and Barb
11. Ivarstead, Vilemyr Inn
12. Riften, Ragged Flagon
13. Windhelm, Candlehearth Hall
14. Windhelm, Cornerclub
15. Kynesgrove, Braidwood Inn
16. Dragon Bridge, Four Shields Tavern
17. Falkreath, Dead Man's Drink

[color=#1e84cc][size=4]What's my load order?[/size][/color]

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Dawnguard.esm
HearthFires.esm
Dragonborn.esm
Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch.esp
YOUR MODS
Requiem.esp
Requiem - Bugsmasher Edition.esp
Requiem Patches that touch food
[b]Requiem - Food Vendors.esp <---- Mine[/b]
Requiem for the Indifferent.esp

[color=#6d9eeb][size=4]Another good mod for food buffs[/size][/color]

author: vram1974
